name: Pair Tan Brown & Stainless Steel Swivel Chairs by Gardner Leaver

condition.details: Reupholstered. Wear consistent with age and use. Professionally reupholstered and the chromed steel frames are shiny, hand polished.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: This stunning and sculptural pair of series 450 swivel armchairs designed by Gardner Leaver for Steelcase, circa 1970 in the USA. They feature circular bases bisected by a convex rectangular support - in lustrous polished stainless steel- which connects to the base of each chair. Additionally, they offer curvinilear arms with the tops newly reupholstered in a tan brown colored leatherette. Both chairs are in mint condition. A stunning and very comfortable pair. With their refined color palate and graphic silhouette, these chairs would be a winning addition to any style of interior from classic Mid Century Modern to contemporary. Steelcase was one of the furniture makers behind the coolly functional midcentury American office, and artist Gardner Leaver created the Michigan company’s most coveted C-suite lounge chair, establishing a design legacy.
